alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 1:20PM CDT until June 25 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rhea County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Loudon County in east Tennessee... Meigs County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... McMinn County in east Tennessee... Northern Monroe County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/. * At 220 PM EDT/120 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fairview to near Spring City to 9 miles northwest of Pikeville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Dayton, Kingston, Sweetwater, Rockwood, Loudon, Madisonville, Pikeville, Decatur and Fairview. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 41 and 72. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Rhea; Roane
